name: Emoji Copy
description:
Emoji copy is a versatile extension designed to simplify emoji selection and clipboard management.

You need libgda for this extension to work, but don't worry, it's pretty easy to install:

Fedora: sudo dnf install libgda libgda-sqlite
Arch Linux: sudo pacman -S libgda
Ubuntu/Debian: sudo apt install gir1.2-gda-5.0
openSUSE: sudo zypper install libgda-6_0-sqlite typelib-1_0-Gda-6_0

It is a fork of Emoji Selector.
